body:
import Chart from '../../components/chart.astro';

## Oral Dosage of 2C-T-2
| Effect | Dose |
| --- | --- |
| Threshold | 5 mg |
| Light | 8-15 mg |
| Common | 15-22 mg |
| Strong | 26-40 mg |
| Heavy | 40+ mg |


<Chart title={frontmatter.duration_chart_title} data={frontmatter.duration_chart} />

## Oral Duration of 2C-T-2
|  | Duration |
| --- | --- |
| Total | 6-8 hr |
| Onset | 1 hr |
| Coming Up | 2 hr |
| Plateau | 2 hr |
| Coming Down | 2 hr |

| Coming Down | 1 hr 30 min |

## Oral Duration of psilocybin mushrooms
| | Duration |
| --- | --- |
| Total | 4-6 hr |
| Onset | 30 min |
| Coming Up | 2 hr |
| Plateau | 2 hr 30 min |
| Coming Down | 1 hr 30 min |
